response.job_title: Project Manager - Industrial Automation - Chemical Engineer
response.skills: Project Management, Industrial Automation, DCS distributed control system, Leadership, Client relationship management, Change requests, Problem solving, Team management, Interpersonal  skills, OH&S (Occupational Health and Safety), Maintenance, Oil & Gas, Documents management, Standards for automation, HAZOP -  LOPA, BPCS (basic process control system), Alarm management, Communication, Microsoft Project - Intermediate user, SCADA (supervisory control and data acquisition)

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsibilities include managing the assessment, diagnosis, and maintenance of ABB (Asea Brown Boveri) BPCS (Basic Process Control Systems) for refined fuel pipelines operated by CENIT S.A. 
•	Coordinating the emergency assistance, achieving response times of 10 minutes (remote connection) and 4 hours (on-site) without disrupting the operation of oil & gas pumping stations.
•	Planning and overseeing the implementation of advanced control sequences for over 60% of the plant processes, resulting in a 50% increase in automated plant operation without human intervention.
•	Developing MS-Excel databases to optimize the distribution of human talent, time management, supplies, and personnel transport across 15 oil and gas pumping stations.
•	Coordination the QHSE (Quality, health, safety, and environment) policy for ABB’s projects, ensuring zero occupational diseases and accidents.
•	Providing support for the continuous improvement of the Occupational Health and Safety (OH&S) management system to validate the renewal of the ISO 45001:2018 standard.
profile_positions.title: Project manager and logistic coordinator of automation services

profile_positions.description:
•	Migration/Upgrade of legacy control systems of polyducts, including project planning, Factory Acceptance Tests (FAT), Site Acceptance Tests (SAT) and start-up of BPCS. These systems are vital for controlling the transport of all supplied fuel to the city of Bogota D.C.
•	Design of innovative guidelines for industrial automation based on American Heart Association guidelines (AHA). This approach improves the accuracy of technical recommendations for equipment safety.
profile_positions.title: Design Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Logistic planning, testing and installation of state-of-the-art BPCS shelters, hosted FOXBORO control systems. The modules were installed at OCENSA S.A. plants, avoiding the need of complex architectural/civil construction works.
•	Analysis to identify potential overpressure and leak incidents and implementing safe operating limits accordingly. This involved configuring Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition (SCADA) and Distributed Control System (DCS) platforms.
profile_positions.title: Project engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Design/initiation of training programs for plant operators and engineering crew. Topics included process fundamentals, control automation technologies, standards of the International Society of Automation, and fuel dynamic measurement systems.
•	Development of logic flow diagrams, cause-effect matrixes, testing protocols and automation systems architectures for 10 projects in the oil & gas sector.
profile_positions.title: Design Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Development of FAT–SAT tests for migration of DCS at OCENSA S.A. company.
•	Elaboration of system philosophies documents, control narratives and testing protocols for updating of control systems at ECOPETROL S.A.
profile_positions.title: Engineering Assistant

profile_positions.description: •	Documentation for installation and commissioning of DCS at ECOPETROL S.A. pumping station (engineering, procurement, and construction project activities).
profile_positions.title: Junior engineering assistant: pipeline transport of oil and gas

profile_positions.description:
•	Configuration and design of Human-Machine Interface (HMI) and control logics for rotatory and electrical furnaces in Cerromatoso-South 32 (Ferronickel production plant, formerly operated by BHP Group)
•	Commissioning of new signals and start-up for DCS of Noss Project (Off gas system FC-01) in Cerromatoso-South 32 plant.•	Startup of updated DCS controllers in hydroelectric power plants of Medellin’s public service company (EPM).
•	Elaboration of instrument logic diagrams, input-output list, FAT/SAT protocols, commissioning, and start-up for DCS at Termopaipa (Thermal power station operated by GENSA S.A. E.S.P.).
profile_positions.title: Junior engineering assistant: mining process - power generation processes

profile_positions.description:
•	Development of Piping and Instrumentation Diagrams (P&ID), signals lists and instrument loop diagrams for 13 projects of Front-End Engineering Design (FEED) and detailed engineering of oil & gas companies. •	HMI configuration and startup for DCS upgrading of de-inking unit at Papeles Nacionales S.A. (Pulp and paper plant)
•	Development of Instrumentation-Control Diagrams (I&CD) and instrumentation data sheets for conceptual engineering stages in IBAL (Water treatment plant).
profile_positions.title: Technic engineering assistant: petrochemical processes - pulp-paper and water processes

profile_positions.description:
•	Business idea co-creation, technical and market assessments, and business plan design. 
•	Marketing strategy coordination for food organic products based on Physalis peruviana, Solanum betaceum and Feijoa sellowiana.
•	Product development, processing, and testing. Suppliers' management and costs control.
•	Coordination of procedure for food and beverages registration.
profile_positions.title: Chief Operating Officer

company.name: IBUN - Instituto de Biotecnología de la Universidad Nacional de Colombia

profile_positions.company: IBUN - Instituto de Biotecnología de la Universidad Nacional de Colombia
profile_positions.description:
•	Conducting a SWOT (Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, Threats) analysis
•	Selecting biotechnology research projects with a high probability of offering a commercial product or service.
•	Applying the quick technology assessment methodology (QTA) to determine the value of emerging technologies as new business opportunities.
•	Searching for investment and commercial partners for projects.
profile_positions.title: Junior research assistant  Bio- Business Research Group.

education.degree_name: Industrial Instrumentation with emphasis in oil & gas industry (DIA-SP)
Measurement for custody transfer of oil and refined fuels
